item.title: Ancient Altar Says I Need To Do Desert Treasure
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

if (objectID == 6552) { if (playerAncientMagics == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 playerAncientMagics = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!"); } else if (playerAncientMagics == 0) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); playerAncientMagics = 1; sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Ancient Altar Says I Need To Do Desert Treasure

item.title: Ancient Altar Says I Need To Do Desert Treasure
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

Ok You Gave Me The Right Altar Id And I Added It But It Says I Need To Complete DT.
How do I Make It So When Players Come On They Already Have DT Done? Or How Can I Edit This Code To Make It Work?

This Is What I Have Under My Ancients.

if (objectID == 6552) { if (q3 != 15 && playerAncientMagics == 0){ sM("You must complete Desert Treasure if you want to use Ancients."); } if (playerAncientMagics == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 playerAncientMagics = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!"); } else if (playerAncientMagics == 0 && q3 == 15) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); playerAncientMagics = 1; sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Ancient Altar Says I Need To Do Desert Treasure

item.title: Ancient Altar Says I Need To Do Desert Treasure
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

The altar you’re looking for is probably 6552.

if (cmd.equals("switch")) { if (ancients == 0) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); ancients =+ 1; } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); ancients = 0; } }

Read full topic
item.source: Ancient Altar Says I Need To Do Desert Treasure

item.title: Ancient Altar Says I Need To Do Desert Treasure
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

Ok You Gave Me The Right Altar Id And I Added It But It Says I Need To Complete DT.
How do I Make It So When Players Come On They Already Have DT Done? Or How Can I Edit This Code To Make It Work?

This Is What I Have Under My Ancients.

if (objectID == 6552) { if (q3 != 15 && playerAncientMagics == 0){ sM("You must complete Desert Treasure if you want to use Ancients."); } if (playerAncientMagics == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 playerAncientMagics = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!"); } else if (playerAncientMagics == 0 && q3 == 15) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); playerAncientMagics = 1; sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }
